attributes.action: abolish the compulsory interviews for people renewing passports, which come into effect from 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Interviewing people who are renewing passports will not tackle identity fraud, and is another interference in the lives of millions of individuals, many of whom will not bother to renew their passports. This is a measure which is also grossly ill-conceived and inconvenient to those who travel on a regular basis for business matters, and we petition the Prime Minister to reverse this immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
